sqlMap.statement:
SELECT t.cast_type,t.currency_cd, SUM(TOTAL_NUM) AS TOTAL_NUM, SUM(TOTAL_VAL) AS TOTAL_VAL, SUM(t.alert_num) AS alert_num, SUM(t.success_num) AS success_num, SUM(t.handout_num) AS handout_num, SUM(t.alertnvl) AS alertnvl from t07_inrep_by_acct t where 1>0
T.REPORT_DT >= #dt_start#
T.REPORT_DT <= #dt_end#
T.ORGANKEY in($organstrs$)
t.organkey in (select m.suborgankey from t87_organ_map M where M.ORGANKEY = #selectList[]#)
group by t.cast_type,t.currency_cd

SELECT t.cast_type,t.currency_cd, SUM(TOTAL_NUM) AS TOTAL_NUM, SUM(TOTAL_VAL) AS TOTAL_VAL, SUM(t.alert_num) AS alert_num, SUM(t.success_num) AS success_num, SUM(t.handout_num) AS handout_num, SUM(t.alertnvl) AS alertnvl from t07_inrep_by_acct t where 1>0
T.REPORT_DT >= #dt_start#
T.REPORT_DT <= #dt_end#
T.ORGANKEY in($organstrs$)
T.ORGANKEY = #selectList[]#
group by t.cast_type,t.currency_cd

SELECT t.cast_type,t.currency_cd, SUM(TOTAL_NUM) AS TOTAL_NUM, SUM(TOTAL_VAL) AS TOTAL_VAL, SUM(t.alert_num) AS alert_num, SUM(t.success_num) AS success_num, SUM(t.handout_num) AS handout_num, SUM(t.alertnvl) AS alertnvl from t07_inrep_by_acct t where t.cast_type = '1'
T.CREATE_DT >= #dt_start#
T.CREATE_DT <= #dt_end#
T.CURRENCY_CD=#type#
T.ORGANKEY in($organstrs$)
T.ORGANKEY = #selectList[]#
group by t.cast_type,t.currency_cd

SELECT t.cast_type,t.currency_cd, SUM(TOTAL_NUM) AS TOTAL_NUM, SUM(TOTAL_VAL) AS TOTAL_VAL, SUM(t.alert_num) AS alert_num, SUM(t.success_num) AS success_num, SUM(t.handout_num) AS handout_num, SUM(t.alertnvl) AS alertnvl from t07_inrep_by_acct t where t.cast_type = '2'
T.CREATE_DT >= #dt_start#
T.CREATE_DT <= #dt_end#
T.CURRENCY_CD=#type#
T.ORGANKEY in($organstrs$)
T.ORGANKEY = #selectList[]#
group by t.cast_type,t.currency_cd

select a.ticd,a.TSTM,a.CTAC,a.FINN,a.finc,a.firc,a.CRPP,a.TBID,a.CRTP,a.CRAT,a.TSTP,a.TCAC,a.organkey as organKey, a.tsdr,a.crpp,a.TCNM,a.TCAT,a.TCIT,a.TCID,a.TBNM,a.TBNT,a.TBIT,c.msg_type_cd,c.report_type_cd,c.senddate_ch,b.csnm,b.ctnm,a.party_class_cd,a.reportkey,a.tsdt_seqno
from T07_IBH_TSDT a ,t07_nbh_ctif b,t07_msg c
from T07_IBH_TSDT a ,t07_nbh_ctif_UH b,t07_msg_UH c
where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and a.reportkey=c.reportkey
c.msg_type_cd =#msg_type_cd#
a.finc =#finc#
a.TSTM >= #dt_start#
a.TSTM <= #dt_end#
a.finc in($organstrs$)
c.senddate_ch >= #senddate_ch_s#
c.senddate_ch <= #senddate_ch_e#
a.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
a.reportkey = #reportkey#
b.csnm = #csnm#
a.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
a.organkey IN (SELECT SUBORGANKEY FROM T87_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY = #organkey#)

select count(a.TICD)
from T07_IBH_TSDT a ,t07_nbh_ctif b,t07_msg c
from T07_IBH_TSDT a ,t07_nbh_ctif_UH b,t07_msg_UH c
where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and a.reportkey=c.reportkey
c.msg_type_cd =#msg_type_cd#
a.finc =#finc#
a.TSTM >= #dt_start#
a.TSTM <= #dt_end#
a.finc in($organstrs$)
c.senddate_ch >= #senddate_ch_s#
c.senddate_ch <= #senddate_ch_e#
a.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
a.reportkey = #reportkey#
b.csnm = #csnm#
a.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
a.organkey IN (SELECT SUBORGANKEY FROM T87_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY = #organkey#)

select a.ticd,a.TSTM,a.CTAC,a.FINN,a.finc,a.firc,a.CRPP,a.TBID,a.CRTP,a.CRAT,a.TSTP,a.TCAC,a.organkey as organKey, a.tsdr,a.crpp,a.TCNM,a.TCAT,a.TCIT,a.TCID,a.TBNM,a.TBNT,a.TBIT,c.msg_type_cd,c.senddate_ch,b.csnm,b.ctnm,a.reportkey,a.tsdt_seqno
from T07_CBH_TSDT a,t07_nbh_ctif b,t07_msg c
from T07_CBH_TSDT a ,t07_nbh_ctif_UH b,t07_msg_UH c
where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and a.reportkey=c.reportkey
c.msg_type_cd =#msg_type_cd#
a.finc =#finc#
a.TSTM >= #dt_start#
a.TSTM <= #dt_end#
a.finc in($organstrs$)
c.senddate_ch >= #senddate_ch_s#
c.senddate_ch <= #senddate_ch_e#
a.reportkey = #reportkey#
a.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
a.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
b.csnm = #csnm#
a.organkey IN (SELECT SUBORGANKEY FROM T87_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY = #organkey#)

SELECT COUNT(a.TICD)
from T07_CBH_TSDT a ,t07_nbh_ctif b,t07_msg c
from T07_CBH_TSDT a ,t07_nbh_ctif_UH b,t07_msg_UH c
where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and a.reportkey=c.reportkey
c.msg_type_cd =#msg_type_cd#
a.finc =#finc#
a.TSTM >= #dt_start#
a.TSTM <= #dt_end#
a.finc in($organstrs$)
c.senddate_ch >= #senddate_ch_s#
c.senddate_ch <= #senddate_ch_e#
a.reportkey = #reportkey#
a.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
a.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
b.csnm = #csnm#
a.organkey IN (SELECT SUBORGANKEY FROM T87_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY = #organkey#)

select a.ticd,a.TSTM,a.CTAC,a.FINN,a.finc,a.firc,a.CRPP,a.TBID,a.CRTP,a.CRAT,a.TSTP,a.TCAC,a.organkey as organKey, a.tsdr,a.crpp,a.TCNM,a.TCAT,a.TCIT,a.TCID,a.TBNM,a.TBNT,a.TBIT,c.msg_type_cd,c.senddate_ch,b.csnm,b.ctnm,a.party_class_cd,a.reportkey,a.tsdt_seqno
from T07_NBH_TSDT a ,t07_nbh_ctif b,t07_msg c
from T07_NBH_TSDT_UH a ,t07_nbh_ctif_UH b,t07_msg_UH c
where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and a.reportkey=c.reportkey and a.cati_seqno=b.cati_seqno
c.msg_type_cd =#msg_type_cd#
a.finc =#finc#
a.TSTM >= #dt_start#
a.TSTM <= #dt_end#
a.finc in($organstrs$)
c.senddate_ch >= #senddate_ch_s#
c.senddate_ch <= #senddate_ch_e#
a.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
a.reportkey = #reportkey#
b.csnm = #csnm#
a.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
a.organkey = #organkey#

SELECT COUNT(a.TICD)
from T07_NBH_TSDT a ,t07_nbh_ctif b,t07_msg c
from T07_NBH_TSDT_UH a ,t07_nbh_ctif_UH b,t07_msg_UH c
where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and a.reportkey=c.reportkey and a.cati_seqno=b.cati_seqno
c.msg_type_cd =#msg_type_cd#
a.finc =#finc#
a.TSTM >= #dt_start#
a.TSTM <= #dt_end#
a.finc in($organstrs$)
c.senddate_ch >= #senddate_ch_s#
c.senddate_ch <= #senddate_ch_e#
a.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
a.reportkey = #reportkey#
b.csnm = #csnm#
a.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
a.organkey IN (SELECT SUBORGANKEY FROM T87_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY = #organkey#)

select a.ticd,a.TSTM,a.CTAC,a.FINN,a.finc,a.firc,a.CRPP,a.TBID,a.CRTP,a.CRAT,a.TSTP,a.TCAC,a.organkey as organKey, a.tsdr,a.crpp,a.TCNM,a.TCAT,a.TCIT,a.TCID,a.TBNM,a.TBNT,a.TBIT,c.msg_type_cd,c.senddate_ch,b.csnm,b.ctnm,a.party_class_cd,a.reportkey,a.tsdt_seqno
,a.crcd,a.cati_seqno
from T07_NBH_TSDT a ,t07_nbh_ctif b,t07_msg c
from T07_NBH_TSDT_UH a ,t07_nbh_ctif_UH b,t07_msg_UH c
where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and a.reportkey=c.reportkey and a.cati_seqno=b.cati_seqno
c.msg_type_cd =#msg_type_cd#
a.finc =#finc#
a.TSTM >= #dt_start#
a.TSTM <= #dt_end#
a.finc in($organstrs$)
c.senddate_ch >= #senddate_ch_s#
c.senddate_ch <= #senddate_ch_e#
a.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
a.reportkey = #reportkey#
b.csnm = #csnm#
a.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
a.organkey IN (SELECT SUBORGANKEY FROM T87_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY = #organkey#)

SELECT COUNT(a.TICD)
from T07_NBH_TSDT a ,t07_nbh_ctif b,t07_msg c
from T07_NBH_TSDT_UH a ,t07_nbh_ctif_UH b,t07_msg_UH c
where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and a.reportkey=c.reportkey and a.cati_seqno=b.cati_seqno
c.msg_type_cd =#msg_type_cd#
a.finc =#finc#
a.TSTM >= #dt_start#
a.TSTM <= #dt_end#
a.finc in($organstrs$)
c.senddate_ch >= #senddate_ch_s#
c.senddate_ch <= #senddate_ch_e#
a.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
a.reportkey = #reportkey#
b.csnm = #csnm#
a.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
a.organkey = #organkey#

select a.ticd,a.TSTM,a.TSDR,a.CRSP as crpp,a.BKNM as tbnm,a.BITP as tbit,a.BKID as tbid,a.BKNT as tbnt,d.finm as finn,d.firc,d.ficd as finc,a.CRTP,a.CRAT,a.TSTP,a.TCAC,a.TCNM,a.TCIT,a.TCID,a.TCAT,c.msg_type_cd,c.senddate_ch,a.organkey as organKey, b.csnm,b.ctnm,a.party_class_cd,a.rpdi_seqno as tsdt_seqno,a.reportkey
from T07_NBs_rpdi a ,t07_nbs_rbif d,t07_nbs_ctif b,t07_msg c
from T07_NBs_rpdi_UH a ,t07_nbs_rbif_UH d,t07_nbs_ctif_UH b,t07_msg_UH c
where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and a.reportkey=c.reportkey and a.reportkey=d.reportkey and a.rpdi_seqno=b.ctif_seqno
c.msg_type_cd =#msg_type_cd#
d.ficd =#finc#
a.TSTM >= #dt_start#
a.TSTM <= #dt_end#
d.ficd in($organstrs$)
c.senddate_ch >= #senddate_ch_s#
c.senddate_ch <= #senddate_ch_e#
a.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
a.reportkey = #reportkey#
b.csnm = #csnm#
a.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
a.organkey = #organkey#

select count(a.TICD)
from T07_NBs_rpdi a ,t07_nbs_rbif d,t07_nbs_ctif b,t07_msg c
from T07_NBs_rpdi_UH a ,t07_nbs_rbif_UH d,t07_nbs_ctif_UH b,t07_msg_UH c
where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and a.reportkey=c.reportkey and a.reportkey=d.reportkey and a.ctif_seqno=b.ctif_seqno
c.msg_type_cd =#msg_type_cd#
d.ficd =#finc#
a.TSTM >= #dt_start#
a.TSTM <= #dt_end#
d.ficd in($organstrs$)
c.senddate_ch >= #senddate_ch_s#
c.senddate_ch <= #senddate_ch_e#
a.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
a.reportkey = #reportkey#
b.csnm = #csnm#
a.party_class_cd = #party_class_cd#
a.organkey = #organkey#
